meanings.definition: Over a long distance or period of time.
meanings.sent1: She walked longways to reach the park.
meanings.sent2: The train traveled longways across the country.
meanings.sent3: The snail moved longways, but it still took forever to get to the finish line.
meanings.sent4: His patience stretched longways, enduring the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed longways, carving its path through the valley.

meanings.sent3: The pencil rolled longways off the desk and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The shadow stretched longways in the late afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: The road extended longways into the horizon, disappearing from view.
